topics.body:
Lucky Star ep11 impressions

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[spoiler]I don't know if I'll ever learn the OP

Train problems. I don't live near a train so I never get to ride one that often, much less sleep on one.

"just 5 more minutes of Lucky Star" EHAN said with 18 minutes left in the episode

"YO" Konata what

Tsukasa now you screwed up, you don't just tell people that Santa isn't real >_>

"I wouldn't go around insulting the legacy of a saint if I were you... you horrid child" I'm glad I chose the dub, lines like this are hilarious XD

yeah why don't we have self-defense classes in schools :/

Kagami with the sick burn

YAKISOBA

"NO" "yes"

ooh static electricity discussion

and Konata's dad has an odd fascination for static shock

oh god Akira is gonna be in episode 12? this can only end badly XD[/spoiler]

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This episode was a bit slow, not bad but I felt like I was really reaching for stuff to talk about
